DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effects and safety of oxidized, regenerated cellulose as an absorbable adhesion barrier after thyroidectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Use of an Oxidized Regenerated Cellulose After Thyroid Surgery: A Prospective, Randomized Study
DOC.criteria: operable thyroid neoplasm a history of previous neck surgeries or uncontrolled medical diseases such as hyperthyroidism, diabetes, and hypertension administration of nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) or antiplatelet agents within 1 week before surgery
